WhyNotWordPress.tagline: TIME TO STOP DOING WHAT EVERYONE ELSE DOES
WhyNotWordPress.heading: Why not WordPress?
WhyNotWordPress.subheading: A modern business needs modern solutions. WordPress is no longer the standard.
WhyNotWordPress.quote: How do you want to stand out if your website will look like hundreds of others? Your business deserves more than a WordPress template.
WhyNotWordPress.author: Micha≈Ç Rowi≈Ñski

card1.title: A website like thousands of others
card1.description: A template is not design. Stand out instead of blending in with the crowd.

card2.title: Outdated technology
card2.description: WordPress is over 20 years old. In the IT world, that's an eternity. Next.js is the standard for modern businesses.

card3.title: Performance issues
card3.description: WordPress often means slow loading and a frustrating user experience. Next.js delivers lightning-fast page speeds.

card4.title: Security
card4.description: Popularity attracts attacks. Additional security requires expensive plugins and constant updates.

card5.title: High maintenance costs
card5.description: Expensive hosting, plugins, updates, and technical support. Next.js runs on free Vercel hosting with no additional fees.

About.heading: Creating modern websites that deliver results
About.subheading: We combine modern technologies with thoughtful design to make your website stand out from the competition
About.description1: First, we need to thoroughly understand your business - its strengths, vision, approach to customers, and unique selling points against competition. We'll analyze the market, check what works for others, and select the best solutions for you. The target audience is also crucial - it determines whether the site should be modern and dynamic, or classic and serious.
About.description2: AI Chatbot for appointment booking? Newsletter system for promotional updates? Contact form, blog with customer tips? Or maybe an application that will replace Excel and automate company processes?
About.description3:
Together, we'll find the best solutions that will make your company set the trends, and competitors will start copying your ideas.
Don't believe it? Check it out!

Timeline.heading: Collaboration Process
Timeline.subheading: From first contact to a ready-to-launch website

step1.title: Intro Call & Needs Analysis
step1.content: Reach out via form, phone, or email. We'll discuss your goals, collect materials, and suggest the best solutions.

step2.title: Quote & Planning
step2.content: Based on your input, we prepare a quote, timeline, and site structure tailored to your business.

step3.title: Content & Layout
step3.content: We propose content and layout aligned with your brand. Your feedback helps refine the final version.

step4.title: Development & SEO
step4.content: We build a fast, responsive website optimized for performance, SEO, and mobile devices.

step5.title: Testing & Launch
step5.content: We test every feature thoroughly. After your approval, we launch the site and set up email and analytics tools.

step6.title: Ongoing Support
step6.content: After launch, we offer technical support and help grow your site as your business evolves.

Faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
Faq.subheading: Learn more about our work, website development process and benefits

Question1.question: Why do we use Next.js?
Question1.answer: Next.js is a modern technology that ensures excellent SEO optimization and high performance. Websites built with Next.js load instantly and are better indexed by Google. Additionally, maintenance costs are minimal because sites can run on free Vercel hosting ‚Äì a platform created by Next.js developers.

Question2.question: What additional costs may occur?
Question2.answer:
• - Domain (website name): approx. $4.99/year
  • - Hosting is available on Vercel for free
  • - Business email (optional): approx. $5.99/year with our recommended provider Hostinger

Question3.question: How long does it take to create a website?
Question3.answer: Development time depends on the chosen package. A simple website can be ready in 5-7 business days, while more complex projects take 7 to 30 days. The speed of implementation also depends on the delivery of materials by the client.

Question4.question: Can I edit the website content myself?
Question4.answer: Absolutely! However, remember to request this feature during the project estimation phase. The Content Management System (CMS) is available in the "Premium Solution" package and allows for easy editing of texts, images, and other website elements without any programming knowledge.

Question5.question: Will my website be visible in Google?
Question5.answer: Yes, all our websites are SEO optimized, which increases their visibility in search engines and improves rankings.

Question6.question: Can I add additional features to the website?
Question6.answer: Yes, you can order additional features such as multilingual support, business email configuration, dark/light mode, blog, testimonials module, newsletter, AI chatbot, or e-commerce functionality.

Question7.question: How much does a website cost?
Question7.answer: The price depends on the chosen package and project complexity. Simple landing pages start from $349$, while more advanced projects start from $549$. For sophisticated solutions, the price is determined individually.

Question8.question: What rights will I have to the website after project completion?
Question8.answer: After project completion, you receive full rights to the website and code, as well as all necessary access credentials.

summary.title: In this article you will learn:

UnderPressure.title: Modern website for a pressure washing company

projectDescription.title: Project Description
projectDescription.content: For Under Pressure, we created a modern website that not only catches the eye but also actively supports business growth. The main goal was to design a platform that professionally showcases their pressure washing services, builds trust, and encourages users to get in touch. The result? A noticeable increase in visibility and customer numbers within just a few months.

design.title: Design
design.description: A minimalist yet visually impactful design based on strong contrasts and high-quality AI-generated graphics. A clean layout, intuitive navigation, and themed iconography make it immediately clear what kind of brand users are interacting with ‚Äî modern, precise, and trustworthy.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: The website was built with speed, full responsiveness, and maximum SEO efficiency in mind. Using techniques like lazy loading, image optimization, and structured page layout, we achieved excellent performance scores and high rankings in search results.

features.title: Features
features.description: The site includes a dynamic hero section with rotating text, a project gallery, contact form, two interactive maps, and numerous SEO optimizations. Every element was designed with user experience and conversion in mind, creating an effective marketing tool for a local service business.

UnderPressure.description: A modern showcase site that elevated a pressure washing company to the top of local Google search results in just a few months.

Google-position-1.title: Google Position #1
Google-position-1.description: Just 6 months after launch, the site reached the #1 position on Google for key local pressure washing-related phrases. Optimized content and site structure significantly increased organic traffic.

Google-position-2.title: Search Engine Dominance
Google-position-2.description: The website consistently ranks right below sponsored results, bringing in a steady stream of new customers. It dominates search results for queries related to paving cleaning, facade washing, and roof cleaning.

SEO.title: Modern Website for a Pressure Washing Company - Portfolio
SEO.description: See how we helped Under Pressure achieve a #1 Google ranking. A high-performing website for a pressure washing business.
SEO.ogTitle: Under Pressure - Case Study | NextGen Sites
SEO.ogDescription: Discover how we built a website that hit #1 in Google for key pressure washing phrases within 6 months.

BuildWise.title: Modern website for a construction company
BuildWise.description: A modern online platform that strengthens the image of a construction brand and supports its growth.

projectDescription.title: Project Description
projectDescription.content: The design combines modern aesthetics with functionality. Light and Dark mode support allows the website to automatically adapt to the user's preferred color scheme set in their operating system. This creates a stronger impression on users who prefer dark themes, while still remaining friendly to those who favor a lighter look. The page structure was designed with readability, intuitive navigation, and quick access to key information in mind.

design.title: Design
design.description: The graphic design combines modernity with functionality. Light and Dark mode support allows the website to automatically adapt to the user's preferred color scheme set in their operating system. This makes a stronger impression on users who prefer dark themes, while still remaining friendly for those who favor a light appearance. The website structure is designed with readability, intuitive navigation, and quick access to key information in mind.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: The site was built using Next.js 15 and integrated with Sanity CMS, ensuring high performance and simple content management. We implemented multilingual support (PL, EN, DE, UA), a professional blog, a job listing module, and an extended contact form. Every detail was optimized for speed, responsiveness, and SEO.

features.title: Features
features.description: With Sanity CMS, the client can manage content independently, the blog increases Google visibility, and the job offers module supports the recruitment process. The site supports 4 languages, works in light and dark mode, and integrated Google Analytics helps analyze user behavior. Additionally, a contact form with attachment options has been implemented.

Google-position-1.title: Expert Blog
Google-position-1.description: The blog module allows publishing specialized articles that attract organic traffic and position the company as an industry expert. Each post includes a contact form to easily connect with potential clients interested in the topic.

Google-position-2.title: Easy Content Editing
Google-position-2.description: With Sanity CMS, the client can effortlessly update texts and images, add new blog posts, and manage job listings ‚Äî all without technical skills.

SEO.title: Modern Website for a Construction Company - Portfolio
SEO.description: See how we created a multilingual website for BuildWise, featuring CMS, expert blog, and job listing functionality.
SEO.ogDescription: Discover how we built a modern, multilingual platform with Sanity CMS, an expert blog, and recruitment tools for a construction company.
